title: World at Large - When Things Fall Apart (The Take 2008)
description:
Indie / Pop Punk / Alternative

Kick ass music video of "When things fall apart". This is the 1st singel from World at Large&#039;s debut album "The take", released february 2008. Dir: Martin Hawkes, SAFT Film.


World at Large is one of Norway&#039; best indie rockin&#039; bands. The video shows the band in a live performance rockin&#039; out. If they show up in your town, be sure to catch the show. They have some legendary shows under their belt....In the meantime, check out their Myspace page:
